1561820.name: Boinihi - Bonus Content Pack
1561820.description:
Note: this Bonus Content pack is a Zip archive. You will have to open it from your local Steam folder.

This free DLC includes :

- The artbook 7 Years of Black Cube, in PDF format, which looks back at the creation of all the games in the Black Cube series between 2012 and 2020.

- The original soundtrack of Boinihi composed by Yazorius (mp3), and the main theme of the game arranged for piano (video)

- The first episode of ANTERRAN comics illustrated by John Carvajal.

- Several video (making of, watercoloring the Ki Codex...) and the game cover.

Boinihi is a 2d adventure game (point and click type) that is played in 3rd person view (Syberia style...), developed between 2016 and 2020 by a single person.
1561820.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
